reviewText: Disappointed. Didn't work due to the kind of disc wouldn't work with American made dvd players. Apparently said that in the fine print that I never saw.  And what it would have cost me to return, I could have bought 2 more in its place.

As with all other reviewers this is an excellent comedy. Probably the most iconic of Laurel and Hardy movies and maybe the funniest and best. Upon recent of the DVD I was not able to play it on my DVD player - may need a universal DVD player. Plays fine on the computer.
